Detailed Description

Format of the TransferDataError Command Payload. See ZigBee Smart Energy Profile Specification r17, Figure D.41.

Definition at line 541 of file zclSmartEnergyTunnelCluster.h.

Field Documentation

uint16_t _ZclTransferDataErrorPayload_t::tunnelId

A number between 0..65535 that uniquely identifies the tunnel.

Definition at line 544 of file zclSmartEnergyTunnelCluster.h.

uint8_t _ZclTransferDataErrorPayload_t::status

The field indicates the error that occurred within the receiver after the last TransferData command.

ZCL_SeTunnelStatus_t.
